data.title: Citroën C5 X HYPNOS Deal
data.meta_description: Browse the Citroën C5 X  HYPNOS deal at your local Chorley Group Citroën dealership today. Enquire online for more information.
data.text:
Keep Life Moving With a Citroen Warranty

We know how important your Citroën is to you.

That’s why when you buy a new Citroën you get all the advantages of a full warranty with manufacturing, paintwork, and perforation defects all covered. In certain situations, we’ll even go beyond our legal warranty obligations because we want your ownership journey to be a happy one.

Citroën’s manufacturer warranty is valid across the whole EU and in 15 other countries and regions. In the unlikely event you do experience some bumps along the way, we promise that any work covered will be carried out free of charge by our experts.

Warranties included with your new Citroen

Diagnostics:

- Coverage: Defective parts, except those that are subject to normal wear and tear (e.g. brake pads)

- Contents of the warranty: Repair or free replacement of defective parts

- Duration/mileage: 3 years from the date of registration, unlimited mileage in the first two years and is limited to 60K miles (100K miles on commercial vehicles) in the third year.

Paintwork:

- Defects covered: Defect in the paintwork or lacquer on the original bodywork

- Contents of the warranty: Partial or total respraying or re-lacquering to rectify the defect

- Duration/km: 2 years (personal and commercial vehicles)

Perforation:

- Defects covered: Perforation/corrosion of the bodywork from the inside to the outside

- Contents of the warranty: Repair or replacement of the defective parts where the corrosion is visible

- Duration/km: 12 years (personal car), 5 years (commercial vehicle)

Electric car:
